text:
[Verse]
Shadows on the wall
Moving with the night
Dancing on the floor
Under the moonlight

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the dark
Echoes of a dream
Hearts begin to spark
Flowing like a stream

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows fly
Reach up to the sky
Feel the rhythm high
Never asking why

[Verse 3]
Stars above so bright
Guiding us along
Lost within the night
Listen to the song

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows fly
Reach up to the sky
Feel the rhythm high
Never asking why

[Bridge]
In the silence find
Harmony and peace
Leave your worries blind
Let the music seize
title: Dancing Shadows
